timeline.message:
CLDR-13973 restructure UTF-8, XML Reader

- remove uses of unnecessary Charset.forName("UTF-8")
- re-enable the ability to take in BOM in XML (for compat)
- use InputSource / InputStream instead of Reader input.
- other simplifications

CLDR-13973 restructure UTF-8, XML Reader

- remove uses of unnecessary Charset.forName("UTF-8")
- re-enable the ability to take in BOM in XML (for compat)
- use InputSource / InputStream instead of Reader input where possible
(the Reader interface with explicit UTF-8 cannot be used with
XML files containing a BOM.)
